channel.title: Help with customs! all my customs go into the weapon slot
channel.description: can you please tell me what code do i need to use to make custom armor go into the armor slot instead of the weapon slot?

that would make sence, i only added them in 1 place each

item.title: Help with customs! all my customs go into the weapon slot
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

they should go under the same place, only the plate body goes under “platebodies” or something like that, then the hat would go under “hats”, and the bandos helm goes under “helm”… hope that helps. (also just incase, #### equals item id’s lol)

Read full topic
item.source: Help with customs! all my customs go into the weapon slot

item.title: Help with customs! all my customs go into the weapon slot
item.dc:creator: @sergiypro sergiypro
item.description:
@sergiypro wrote:

kk thanx, 13 out of my 17 customs are in the right slot now… but my drag body and top hat and bandos helm isnt… can u help me? what section do that do under?

Read full topic
item.source: Help with customs! all my customs go into the weapon slot

item.title: Help with customs! all my customs go into the weapon slot
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

it has to do with server, go into like item4.java or something, and you will see something with like shields(####,####,####… ect, that is where shields would go, you need to put the armour in the armour part of it.

Read full topic
